TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DirectorySearcher extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 对 Active Directory 域服务执行查询。

span.span: Performs queries against Active Directory Domain Services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 对象，使用轻型目录访问协议 (LDAP) ，搜索 Active Directory 域服务层次结构并执行查询。Use a object to search and perform queries against an Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy using Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP). LDAP 是支持目录搜索 (ADSI) 提供程序的唯一系统提供的 Active Directory 服务接口。LDAP is the only system-supplied Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) provider that supports directory searching. 管理员可以创建、更改和删除在层次结构中找到的对象。An administrator can make, alter, and delete objects that are found in the hierarchy. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用 microsoft.directoryservices](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms180832(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Using System.DirectoryServices](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms180832(v=vs.90)). 当你创建的实例时 ，你可以指定要检索的根，并指定要检索的属性的可选列表。When you create an instance of , you specify the root you want to retrieve, and an optional list of properties to retrieve. 属性使您可以设置其他属性来执行以下任务：The property enables you to set additional properties to do the following tasks: - 在本地计算机上缓存搜索结果。Cache the search results on the local computer. 将 属性设置为，以将 `true` 目录信息存储在本地计算机上。Set the property to `true` to store directory information on the local computer. 仅当调用方法时，才会更新此本地缓存并提交到 Active Directory 域服务 。Updates are made to this local cache and committed to Active Directory Domain Services only when the method is called. - 使用属性指定要搜索的时间长度 。Specify the length of time to search, using the property. - 仅检索属性名称。Retrieve attribute names only. 将 属性设置为 `true` ，只检索已为其分配值的属性的名称。Set the property to `true` to retrieve only the names of attributes to which values have been assigned. - 执行分页搜索。Perform a paged search. 设置 属性以指定分页搜索中返回的对象的最大数目。Set the property to specify the maximum number of objects that are returned in a paged search. 如果不想执行分页搜索，请将 属性设置为其默认值0。If you do not want to perform a paged search, set the property to its default of zero. - 使用属性指定要返回的最大项数 。Specify the maximum number of entries to return, using the property. 如果将属性设置 为其默认值零，则服务器确定的默认值为1000项。If you set the property to its default of zero, the server-determined default is 1000 entries. > [!NOTE] > 如果返回条目的最大数量和时间限制超出服务器上设置的限制，服务器设置将替代组件设置。If the maximum number of returned entries and time limits exceed the limitations that are set on the server, the server settings override the component settings. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. > [!NOTE] > 假设您在使用此类之前，您大致了解 Active Directory 域服务。It is assumed that you have a general understanding of Active Directory Domain Services before using this class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 概述。For more information, see the overview.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否异步执行搜索。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates if the search is performed asynchronously.

value.span: 如果异步执行搜索，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the search is asynchronous; otherwise.

member this.AttributeScopeQuery : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要在其中进行搜索的识别名特性的 LDAP 显示名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the LDAP display name of the distinguished name attribute to search in.

summary.span: 只有一个特性可以用于此类型的搜索。

span.span: Only one attribute can be used for this type of search.

value.span: 要对其执行搜索的特性的 LDAP 显示名称；如果未设置任何特性范围查询，则为空字符串。

span.span: The LDAP display name of the attribute to perform the search against, or an empty string of no attribute scope query is set.

exception.span: 属性被设置为 以外的一个值。

span.span: The property is set to a value other than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CacheResults { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CacheResults : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在客户计算机上缓存结果。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the result is cached on the client computer.

value.span: 如果在客户计算机上缓存结果，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the result is cached on the client computer; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果搜索返回一个较大的结果集，则在将此属性设置为 `false` 以避免将结果集传输到客户端计算机时，搜索将更有效。If the search returns a large result set, the search will be more efficient if this property is set to `false` to avoid the transfer of the result set to the client computer. 但是，如果这样做，则无法枚举结果两次，因为 对象每次调用时都会创建一个新的枚举器对象。If you do so, however, you will not be able to enumerate the results twice, because the object creates a new enumerator object each time it is called.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ClientTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.ClientTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置客户端等候服务器返回结果的最长时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of time that the client waits for the server to return results.

summary.span: 如果服务器在此时间内不响应，则中止搜索，不返回任何结果。

span.span: If the server does not respond within this time, the search is aborted and no results are returned.

value.span: 一个 结构，包含客户端等待服务器返回结果的最长等待时间。

span.span: A structure that contains the maximum amount of time for the client to wait for the server to return results.

value.span: 默认值为 -1 秒，即表示无限期地等候。

span.span: The default value is -1 second, which means to wait indefinitely.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的最小分辨率为一秒。The minimum resolution of this property is one second. 秒的小数部分将被忽略。Fractions of seconds are ignored. 如果在 客户端超时之前达到，则服务器将返回其结果，并且客户端将停止等待。If the is reached before the client times out, the server returns its results and the client stops waiting. 最大服务器时间限制为120秒。The maximum server time limit is 120 seconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::DereferenceAlias DerefAlias { System::DirectoryServices::DereferenceAlias get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::DereferenceAlias value); };
member this.DerefAlias : System.DirectoryServices.DereferenceAlias with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应如何解析搜索过程中找到的对象的别名。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how the aliases of objects that are found during a search should be resolved.

value.span: 值，指定取消引用别名的行为。

span.span: A value that specifies the behavior in which aliases are dereferenced.

value.span: 此属性的默认设置为 。

span.span: The default setting for this property is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::DirectorySynchronization ^ DirectorySynchronization { System::DirectoryServices::DirectorySynchronization ^ get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::DirectorySynchronization ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置表示要与搜索一起使用的目录同步控件的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that represents the directory synchronization control to use with the search.

value.span: 用于搜索的 对象。

span.span: The object for the search.

value.span: 如果不应使用目录同步控件，则为 。

span.span: if the directory synchronization control should not be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目录同步控件通常称为 DirSync 控件，是一种 LDAP 控件，用于搜索自先前状态以来发生更改的对象。The directory synchronization control, commonly referred to as the DirSync control, is an LDAP control that is used to search for objects that have changed since a previous state. 有关详细信息，请参阅主题 [使用 DirSync 控件轮询更改](/windows/desktop/ad/polling-for-changes-using-the-dirsync-control)。For more information, see the topic [Polling for Changes Using the DirSync Control](/windows/desktop/ad/polling-for-changes-using-the-dirsync-control).

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

span.span: if this method releases both managed and unmanaged resources; if it releases only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 对象使用的托管资源，还可以选择释放非托管资源。

span.span: Releases the managed resources that are used by the object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Filter : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示轻量目录访问协议 (LDAP) 格式筛选器字符串的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) format filter string.

value.span: 以 LDAP 格式表示的搜索筛选器，如“(objectClass=user)”。

span.span: The search filter string in LDAP format, such as "(objectClass=user)".

value.span: 默认值为“(objectClass=\*)”，它检索所有对象。

span.span: The default is "(objectClass=\*)", which retrieves all objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该筛选器使用以下准则：The filter uses the following guidelines: 1. 字符串必须括在括号中。The string must be enclosed in parentheses. 2. 表达式可以使用关系运算符： <、 \<=, =, > = 和 >。Expressions can use the relational operators: <, \<=, =, >=, and >. 例如 " (objectClass = user) "。An example is "(objectClass=user)". 另一个示例是 " (lastName>= Davis) "。Another example is "(lastName>=Davis)". 3. 复合表达式的格式为前缀运算符 & 和 |。Compound expressions are formed with the prefix operators & and |. 例如，" ( # A0 (objectClass = user) # B4 lastName = Davis) # A6"。An example is "(&(objectClass=user)(lastName= Davis))". 另一个示例是 " ( # A0 (objectClass = printer) # A5 # A1 (生成 = 42) # B8 大楼 = 43) # A10 # A11"。Another example is "(&(objectClass=printer)(|(building=42)(building=43)))". 如果筛选器包含 ADS_UTC_TIME 类型的属性，则其值必须为 yyyymmddhhmmssZ 格式，其中 y、m、d、h、m 和 s 分别表示年、月、日、小时、分钟和秒。When the filter contains an attribute of ADS_UTC_TIME type, its value must be of the yyyymmddhhmmssZ format where y, m, d, h, m, and s stand for year, month, day, hour, minute, and second, respectively. 秒 (ss) 值是可选的。The seconds (ss) value is optional. 最后一个字母 Z 表示没有时差。The final letter Z means there is no time differential. 采用此格式，"凌晨10:20:00In this format, "10:20:00 A.M. 5月13日，1999 "变为" 19990513102000Z "。May 13, 1999" becomes "19990513102000Z". 请注意，Active Directory 域服务将日期和时间存储为协调世界时 (格林尼治标准时间) 。Note that Active Directory Domain Services stores date and time as Coordinated Universal Time (Greenwich Mean Time). 如果指定一个没有时间差异的时间，则将使用 GMT 时间指定时间。If you specify a time with no time differential, you are specifying the time in GMT time. 如果你不在协调世界时时区，则可以将差异值添加到协调世界时 (，而不是指定 Z) 来根据你的时区指定时间。If you are not in the Coordinated Universal Time time zone, you can add a differential value to the Coordinated Universal Time (instead of specifying Z) to specify a time according to your time zone. 差异基于以下内容：微分 = 协调世界时本地。The differential is based on the following: differential = Coordinated Universal Time- Local. 若要指定差异，请使用以下格式： yyyymmddhhmmss [+/-] hhmm。To specify a differential, use the following format: yyyymmddhhmmss[+/-]hhmm. 例如，"8:52:58 P。MFor example, "8:52:58 P.M. 1999年3月23日 (差异为12小时) 指定为 "19990323205258.0 + 1200"。March 23, 1999" New Zealand Standard Time (the differential is 12 hours) is specified as "19990323205258.0+1200". 有关 LDAP 搜索字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅 [搜索筛选器语法](/windows/desktop/adsi/search-filter-syntax)。For more information about the LDAP search string format, see [Search Filter Syntax](/windows/desktop/adsi/search-filter-syntax).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection FindAll() cil managed

summary.span: 执行搜索并返回找到的项的集合。

span.span: Executes the search and returns a collection of the entries that are found.

returns.span: 包含搜索结果的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the results of the search.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于实现限制，在 垃圾回收类时，该类无法释放其所有非托管资源。Due to implementation restrictions, the class cannot release all of its unmanaged resources when it is garbage collected. 若要防止内存泄露，必须 在不再需要该对象时调用方法 。To prevent a memory leak, you must call the method when the object is no longer needed.

span.span: The specified is not a container.

exception.span: 正在使用的提供程序不支持搜索。

span.span: Searching is not supported by the provider that is being used.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult FindOne() cil managed

summary.span: 执行搜索并只返回找到的第一项。

span.span: Executes the search and returns only the first entry that is found.

returns.span: 一个 对象，该对象包含搜索过程中找到的第一项。

span.span: A object that contains the first entry that is found during the search.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在搜索过程中发现多个条目，则仅返回第一个条目。If more than one entry is found during the search, only the first entry is returned. 如果找不到与搜索条件匹配的项，则 `Nothing` 返回 Visual Basic) 中 (空引用。If no entries are found to match the search criteria, a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PageSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.PageSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示分页搜索中的页大小的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the page size in a paged search.

value.span: 服务器在分页搜索中能够返回的对象的最大数量。

span.span: The maximum number of objects the server can return in a paged search.

value.span: 默认值为零，即表示不进行分页搜索。

span.span: The default is zero, which means do not do a paged search.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在服务器找到属性指定的对象数后 ，它将停止搜索并将结果返回到客户端。After the server has found the number of objects that are specified by the property, it will stop searching and return the results to the client. 当客户端请求更多数据时，服务器会将搜索从中断位置重新启动。When the client requests more data, the server will restart the search where it left off.

span.span: The new value is less than zero.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示搜索过程中要检索的属性列表。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the list of properties to retrieve during the search.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含搜索过程中要检索的属性集。

span.span: A object that contains the set of properties to retrieve during the search.

value.span: 默认值为空 ，即检索所有属性。

span.span: The default is an empty , which retrieves all properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要检索特定属性，请在开始搜索之前将其添加到此集合中。To retrieve specific properties, add them to this collection before you begin the search. 例如， `searcher.PropertiesToLoad.Add("phone");` 将 "电话" 属性添加到搜索中要检索的属性列表中。For example, `searcher.PropertiesToLoad.Add("phone");` will add the phone property to the list of properties to retrieve in the search. 属性 "ADsPath" 始终在搜索过程中检索。The property "ADsPath" is always retrieved during the search. 在 [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)] 和更早版本的操作系统上，执行搜索的帐户必须是 Administrators 组的成员才能检索 ntSecurityDescriptor 属性。On [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)] and earlier operating systems, the account that performs the search must be a member of the Administrators group to retrieve the ntSecurityDescriptor property. 如果不是这样，则为 ntSecurityDescriptor 返回的属性值将为 `null` 。If this is not the case, the property value that is returned for ntSecurityDescriptor will be `null`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [NT-安全描述符](/windows/desktop/adschema/a-ntsecuritydescriptor) 文章。For more information, see the [NT-Security-Descriptor](/windows/desktop/adschema/a-ntsecuritydescriptor) article.

member this.PropertyNamesOnly : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示搜索是否只检索已经为其赋值的特性的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the search retrieves only the names of attributes to which values have been assigned.

value.span: 如果搜索只获取已经为其赋值的特性的名称，则为 ；如果搜索获取所有请求的特性的名称和值，则为 。

span.span: if the search obtains only the names of attributes to which values have been assigned; if the search obtains the names and values for all the requested attributes.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

summary.span: 获取或设置指示如何追踪转交 (Referral) 的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how referrals are chased.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未在服务器的命名上下文中指定根搜索，或者搜索结果跨越命名上下文 (例如，当你在父域) 中进行搜索时，服务器会向客户端发送引用消息，客户端可以忽略或跟踪。If the root search is not specified in the naming context of the server or when the search results cross a naming context (for example, when you have child domains and search in the parent domain), the server sends a referral message to the client that the client can either ignore or chase.

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating which security access information for the specified attributes should be returned by the search.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ServerPageTimeLimit { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.ServerPageTimeLimit : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示服务器应该搜索单页结果的最长时间的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum amount of time the server should search for an individual page of results.

summary.span: 这不同于整个搜索的时间限制。

span.span: This is not the same as the time limit for the entire search.

value.span: 一个 ，表示服务器应该搜索一页结果的时间量。

span.span: A that represents the amount of time the server should search for a page of results.

value.span: 默认值为 -1 秒，即表示无限期地搜索。

span.span: The default value is -1 seconds, which means to search indefinitely.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的最小分辨率为一秒。The minimum resolution of this property is one second. 秒的小数部分将被忽略。Fractions of seconds are ignored. 达到时间限制后，服务器将停止搜索，并返回与该点累积的结果，以及包含有关恢复搜索位置的信息的 cookie。When the time limit is reached, the server stops searching and returns the results that have accumulated up to that point, along with a cookie containing the information about where to resume searching. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于搜索，其中 设置为不是默认值-1 的值。This property only applies to searches where is set to a value that is not the default of -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ServerTimeLimit { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.ServerTimeLimit : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 属性获取或设置指示服务器在进行搜索时可花费的最长时间的值。

span.span: The property gets or sets a value indicating the maximum amount of time the server spends searching.

summary.span: 如果达到时间限制，则只返回在该时间之前查找到的项。

span.span: If the time limit is reached, only entries that are found up to that point are returned.

value.span: 一个 ，表示服务器应该执行搜索的时间长度。

span.span: A that represents the amount of time that the server should search.

value.span: 默认值为 -1 秒，即表示使用服务器确定的默认值 120 秒。

span.span: The default value is -1 seconds, which means to use the server-determined default of 120 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的最小分辨率为一秒。The minimum resolution of this property is one second. 秒的小数部分将被忽略。Fractions of seconds are ignored. 与 属性不同， 属性指示服务器将在搜索中花费的总时间。Unlike the property, the property indicates the total amount of time that the server will spend on a search. 在达到时间限制时，服务器将停止搜索，并返回已累积到该点的结果。When the time limit is reached, the server stops searching and returns the results that have accumulated up to that point. 设置 为-1 秒，以使用服务器确定的默认值。Set to -1 second to use the server-determined default. > [!NOTE] > 如果将设置 为大于服务器确定的默认值120秒的值，则将使用服务器确定的默认值。If you set to a value that is larger than the server-determined default of 120 seconds, the server-determined default is used. 达到服务器时间限制后，将无法从中断的位置继续搜索。After the server time limit is reached, you cannot continue a search from where it left off.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SizeLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SizeLimit : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示服务器在搜索中返回的最大对象数量的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of objects that the server returns in a search.

value.span: 服务器在搜索中返回的对象的最大数量。

span.span: The maximum number of objects that the server returns in a search.

value.span: 默认值为零，即表示使用由服务器确定的默认大小限制 1000 项。

span.span: The default value is zero, which means to use the server-determined default size limit of 1000 entries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在达到大小限制后，服务器将停止搜索，并返回在该点之前累积的结果。The server stops searching after the size limit is reached and returns the results accumulated up to that point. > [!NOTE] > 如果将设置 为一个大于服务器确定的默认值1000项的值，则将使用服务器确定的默认值。If you set to a value that is larger than the server-determined default of 1000 entries, the server-determined default is used.

span.span: The new value is less than zero.
